title: My Teachers Are Monsters!
description: I first discovered my teachers were monsters on my first day of school. Can you imagine that? When you're four years old, not even old enough to do up your own shoelaces and you discover that not only is your teacher a monster but all the teachers in the entire school (except one) are terrifying, horrifying and generally really rather ugly monsters. Join Herbert Fidget in this hilarious, side splitting, monster adventure!
author: R.W. Mitchell
